text: Saka Tenzi vake vakamutambira mune zvakanaka. Vakamukudza mune zvakanaka uye Zakariya (Zakero) ndiye aimuchengeta. Pose paaipinda Zakariya kwaari Al-Mihraab (mukamuri yake) aimuwana aine chikafu. Akati: “Iwe Maryam (Mariya)! Zvabva kupi zvinhu izvi?” Akati: “Izvi zvabva kuna Allah.” Zvirokwazvo, Allah vanopa Rizq (Chikafu) kune uyo wavada, zvisina muero
